facts.description: Tasks in Fabric are defined in fabfile.py and executed using the fab command.
Virtual environments isolate dependencies for Python projects.
API keys should be stored in environment variables, not hard-coded.
The investigate_document task prepares a JSON skeleton and extracts structured data.

habits.description: Always activate the virtual environment before running tasks.
Use try/except blocks for JSON parsing to handle errors safely.
Print a preview of AI output if JSON parsing fails for debugging.
Keep consistent formatting in prompts for reliable AI output.
